price: Basi Subhanallah! Mtakaseni Mwenyezi Mungu jioni na asubuhi,
arabic: فَسُبۡحَٰنَ ٱللَّهِ حِينَ تُمۡسُونَ وَحِينَ تُصۡبِحُونَ

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: fasub'ḥāna al-lahi ḥīna tum'sūna waḥīna tuṣ'biḥūna
